data: GENDERSURG Enhanced Recovery After Surgery (ERAS) Pre Operative (Pre Anesthesia Clinic)
Activity
Preoperative Surgical Prep Education
Instruct patient to do a thorough cleaning of their genitals with soap and water including all folds and creases two days prior to surgery
Preoperative Surgical Prep Education
Instruct patient to shower evening prior to surgery
Preoperative Surgical Prep Education
Instruct patient to cleanse skin with chlorhexidine gluconate 2% wipes as per instructions following shower
Diet/Nutrition
Carbohydrate Loading is not applicable for diabetic patients on insulin
For patients with NO bowel preparation
Preoperative Surgical Prep Education
No solid food after midnight
For patients who received bowel preparation
Preoperative Surgical Prep Education

On evening prior to surgery: drink 2 glasses (500 mL) of clear juice (e.g. apple juice) or 2 packages of PREcovery (dilute each pakage in 400 mL water and drink over 2 hours). No solid food after bowel preparation
Medications
Preoperative medication instructions as per "VGH and UBCH Pre-operative Medication Guide"
Notify Treating Provider
Notify Anaesthesiologists if patients receiving anticoagulation/antiplatelet agents for discontinuation and/or heparin bridging orders
Preoperative Home Medication Education
Instruct patient to take prescribed morning medications as instructed 1 hour before hospital check-in time with clear fluid per anesthesia
Bowel Preparation Patient Instructions
Preoperative Surgical Prep Education
Instruct patient to have the following bowel preparation: BI-PEGLYTE (PEG 3350 with electrolytes AND bisaCODYL 5 mg tablets bowel preparation - patient to purchase from retail pharmacy)
Preoperative Surgical Prep Education
If indicated, patient could have two doses of sodium phosphate (FLEET PHOSPHATE EQUIV) enema one  hour before leaving for hospital on day of surgery (Patient to purchase from a retail pharmacy)
